name: Trinity Force
passive: Spellblade: After using an ability, your next attack within 10 seconds deals 200% base AD as bonus damage (1.5s cooldown).
tips: Trinity ForceWell-Rounded +250 Max Health +30 Attack Damage +30% Attack Speed +25 Ability HasteFervor:  +5% Move Speed.Spellblade: Using an ability causes the next attack used within 10 seconds to deal bonus physical damage equal to 200% base AD(1.5s Cooldown).
Damage is reduced vs structures.Valor: Attacks grant 20 Move Speed and kills grant 60 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

3333


This item is perfect for champions who frequently use both abilities and auto-attacks in combat.
